SELECT WO.ORG_NM, --기관명 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WAM_DB_SDITM WHERE ORG_NM=WO.ORG_NM) AS DB_ITEM_COUNT, --DB표준 용어 수 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WAM_DB_DMN WHERE ORG_NM=WO.ORG_NM) AS DB_DOAMIN_COUNT, --DB표준 도메인 수 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WAM_DB_STWD WHERE ORG_NM=WO.ORG_NM) AS DB_WORD_COUNT, --DB표준 단어 수 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMM_SDITM A INNER JOIN (SELECT SDITM_LNM,SDITM_PNM,INFOTP_LNM FROM WAM_DB_SDITM WHERE ORG_NM = WO.ORG_NM) B ON (A.SDITM_LNM =B.SDITM_LNM AND A.SDITM_PNM = B.SDITM_PNM AND A.INFOTP_LNM =B.INFOTP_LNM) ) AS COMM_ITEM_COUNT, --공통표준 용어 일치 수 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WAM_SDITM A INNER JOIN (SELECT SDITM_LNM,SDITM_PNM,INFOTP_LNM FROM WAM_DB_SDITM WHERE ORG_NM = WO.ORG_NM) B ON (A.SDITM_LNM =B.SDITM_LNM AND A.SDITM_PNM = B.SDITM_PNM AND A.INFOTP_LNM =B.INFOTP_LNM) ) AS ORG_ITEM_COUNT, --기관표준 용어 일치 수 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMM_DMN A INNER JOIN (SELECT INFOTP_LNM,DATA_LEN,DATA_TYPE FROM WAM_DB_DMN WHERE ORG_NM = WO.ORG_NM) B ON (A.INFOTP_LNM=B.INFOTP_LNM AND A.DATA_LEN = B.DATA_LEN AND A.DATA_TYPE = B.DATA_TYPE) ) AS COMM_DOMAIN_COUNT, --공통표준 도메인 일치 수 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WAM_DMN A INNER JOIN (SELECT INFOTP_LNM,DATA_LEN,DATA_TYPE FROM WAM_DB_DMN WHERE ORG_NM = WO.ORG_NM) B ON (A.INFOTP_LNM=B.INFOTP_LNM AND A.DATA_LEN = B.DATA_LEN AND A.DATA_TYPE = B.DATA_TYPE) ) AS ORG_DOMAIN_COUNT, --기관표준 도메인 일치 수 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMM_STWD A INNER JOIN (SELECT STWD_LNM,STWD_PNM FROM WAM_DB_STWD WHERE ORG_NM = WO.ORG_NM) B ON(A.STWD_LNM=B.STWD_LNM AND A.STWD_PNM = B.STWD_PNM) ) AS COMM_WORD_COUNT, --공통표준 단어 일치 수 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WAM_STWD A INNER JOIN (SELECT STWD_LNM,STWD_PNM FROM WAM_DB_STWD WHERE ORG_NM = WO.ORG_NM) B ON(A.STWD_LNM=B.STWD_LNM AND A.STWD_PNM = B.STWD_PNM) ) AS ORG_WORD_COUNT --기관표준 단어 일치 수 FROM WAA_ORG WO
WHERE WO.ORG_NM LIKE '%' || #{orgNm} || '%'
